title: Here’s your newly renovated cute and cozy home
posting_body: Here’s your newly renovated cute and cozy home with a large backyard and room to expand if desired!

This home has been updated to include new bathrooms and plumbing, new vinyl plank flooring, new utility room, new light fixtures, new ceiling fans, fresh interior and exterior paint, and foundation repair.
In addition to these updates, the kitchen has been remodeled with freshly painted cabinets, new countertops, decorative backsplash, new stainless-steel appliances and new undermount sink.
